name: Four Points by Sheraton Puntacana Village

reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 days and it was very good. Ok it's a brand new place but the rooms are well decorated And the bedding is perfect. Good shower , nice atmosphere. The breakfast is a bit strange. First day alacarte for 10 dollar. Next day only buffet for 15. Bit confusing. Late check out was no problem. Friendly staff. Across the street several good bars and restaurants. In a nice setting. Recommendable for business travellers
reviews.title: Remote location but very good hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel, brand- new, spotless, chic and trendy ... could've been excellent with window that open a bit for some fresh air or a few rooms with patios (you are in the caribbean). Located 3 minutes from the airport close to a grocery store and a new village with a frew good restaurants (the Italian was great) ... Baskin Robbins, coffee shop with internet and a couple more eateries with outdoor seating. The Mexican spot left lots to be desired.
reviews.title: almost excellent / great locale

reviews.text: Free shuttle to/ from airport and to higher priced resort (about 6 min ride) to really nice beach plus enjoy their pool and restaurants. Free computers with internet in lobby, great cable stations ... nice pool. Really nice large modern shower big bathroom. Great for the money.and ok for a short vacay get away because you can save money by going to the resorts instead of paying to stay there! However, a patio would make it my choice for a vacay stay in Punta Cana.
reviews.title: Good for airport stay

reviews.text: Very comfortable and spacious rooms in this almost brand new property. Breakfast is just OK when compared to fantastic breakfast buffets offered elsewhere. Recommended for its airport location but not by any means a place to stay on vacation.l
reviews.title: Better than we expected.

reviews.text: Our airline booked us at this hotel when our flight was cancelled so we only stayed one night. The hotel is under a year old and everything is spotless. All of the staff is wonderful and we thought that the food/beverages were above par for a Sheraton Four Points. The rooms are decorated tastefully, the bathroom is very nice with a large marble and glass shower stall, and the beds are super comfortable. Small, well-kept outdoor pool, we did not use.
reviews.title: Wonderful location. Great Staff. Fantastic room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After missing the last flight out after a 4-night vacation on one of the resorts, we were glad there was a hotel closeby that could pick us up and drop us back for or flight the next afternoon for a reasonable price but saddened that we would have to stay at an airport hotel instead of our great beachfront location we had just left. However, upon arriving at the Four Points, I was pleasantly surprised at the wonderful decor, friendly and helpful staff and great location. The rooms are lovely - well appointed, clean and modern. The lobby is open and airy and though right by the airport, you don't hear the planes at all. Even our room had a decent view! Breakfast was delicious and the staff was more than helpful. We spent the day at the pool before our afternoon flight and it was a great day. With our flight being later in the afternoon, the hotel allowed us to do a late checkout so we just packed up in the afternoon and the shuttle picked us up and brought us back to the airport. If you have time, they provide regular shuttles to the beach and the Puntacana Village across the street is a lovely place for dinner and shopping. All in all, a lovely stay! An unexpected but great stay at this location!
reviews.title: Awesome extra night of vacation!
Clean, comfortable rooms!
reviews.text: Very nice and clean hotel. We only stayed one night. There are many dining choices right next to the hotel. This is not a destination hotel, but perfect for a one night stay. Wifi worked good. I highly recommend this place.

A truly comfortable hotel for business travel. Delicious breakfast buffet, good service and very comfortable and affordable rooms. The beds, pillow and duvet cover are of excellent quality. The hotel has a country inn feel to it.
reviews.title: If you want comfort without losing your shirt

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you are looking for a hotel close the the Punta Cana airport, the Sheraton is excellent. Close to Punta Cana village where you can find restaurants, stores, and a supermarket. Very caring staff and brand new facilities. The shuttle service to other Punta Cana areas, including the airport is great.
reviews.title: An excellent alternative to a typical resort hotel in Punta Cana

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here for a night after a 7 day stay at a resort. The free shuttle to and from the airport is really what sold me - Taxis are super expensive.
reviews.title: An amazing break from the typical Punta Cana vibe

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: During our month-long stay in Punta Cana, we visited the Sheraton several times for their 5 p.m. - 8 p.m. Happy Hour. We also had friends stay there while visiting us. The highlight of the hotel is the service. Melvin and many of the other bartenders provided excellent service. The hotel manager was frequently visible and knew guests. In addition, the rooms are very nice - great value for the price!
reviews.title: Service!

reviews.text: The hotel is new, so everything is still clean, in shape and working condition.
reviews.title: Good for a short stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very convenient for a short stay, close to the airport.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel! The Staff are +++EXCELLENT

reviews.text: Spacious room, very comfortable bed, good quality bed linens. TV with many channels in English and other languages.
reviews.title: No frills but clean and good

reviews.text: There is a small coffeemaker + coffee, tea and bottled water.
reviews.title: Great layover experience!

reviews.text: Clean and new - Very Nice and sleek. No shuttle to the hotel from the airport - that we seen/found anyway. Could have been our mistake but we ended up paying for a cab. They did shuttle us TO the airport.
reviews.title: Clean and close to the airport.

reviews.text: The food was pretty mediocre and priced rather high considering.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: Overall, we would recommend the Sheraton.
reviews.title: very good!!

reviews.text: This hotel is quite new, so everything is in perfect shape. Its a small hotel, mostly used for business trips I suppose, but it is excellent for anyone. It has a great location, close to the Punta Cana Airport, across the street from the village, where you have restaurants, a supermarket, and even a bar.
reviews.title: Four POINTS Punta Cana April 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The rooms were very spacious, and clean, a quality very important to me. The rooms have wifi, driving to Cap Cana, and the beaches is a 20 minute ride. Its a hotel to go to if you know the area, or are just in for a night. If you are traveling with kids on vacation, I recommend you go to one of the many all inclusive resorts in the area. Other than this, I highly recommend you to stay in this hotel.
reviews.title: LUIS Y VERA

description: Close to Everything. The Four Points by Sheraton Puntacana Village is conveniently located in front of Punta Cana International Airport (PUJ). Situated in the heart of a busy commercial area, the hotel provides direct access to the broad range of shopping and dining options of Galerías Punta Cana. It’s an easy drive to the pristine Playa Blanca, to world-class golf courses, or to Santo Domingo along the nearby Coral Highway.
